import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import { withRouter} from 'react-router-dom' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {createProfile} from '../../../actions/profileActs' const Profile = ({createProfile, history}) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ contry:'', city:'', street:'', day:'', month:'', year:'', when:'', how:'', what:'', favePet:'', otherProfiles: true, foroms:true, petForSale: true, adopters: true, genral:'', images:[], twitter:'', youtube:'', facbook:'', instagram:'' }) const [displaySocial, toggleSocial] = useState(false) const { contry, city, street, day, month, year, when, how, what, favePet, otherProfiles, foroms, petForSale, adopters, genral, images, twitter, youtube, facebook, instagram } = formData const makeNumOption =(start, end) =>{ const options =[] for (let i= (start); i <= (end); i++){ options.push() } return options } const onChange = e => setFormData({...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) const sentData = e =>{ e.preventDefault() createProfile(formData, history) } return (

)} Profile.propTypes = { createProfile: PropTypes.func.isRequired, } export default connect(null, {createProfile}) (withRouter(Profile))
